data.title: News
data.meta_description: Andy McCullough is offering a new IAH course in FS20. His course, IAH 209 Advertising: Propaganda, literature, art and entertainment, is an examination of the trends in advertising over the past 200+ years as seen through the lenses of propaganda analysis,…
